name: Solitaire - 2023
description:
Relaxing & Addictive Games of Classic Klondike & Patience Solitaire with Daily Challenges.

Key Features
♠︎ Classic Solitaire gameplay
♠︎ Random or Winnable solitaire decks
♠︎ Draw 1 or 3 cards
♠︎ Single tap or drag & drop to move cards
♣︎ Unlimited hints
♣︎ Unlimited undo
♥︎ Beautiful themes
♥︎ Fun daily challenges
♥︎ Always FREE

Enjoy yourself with the popular and classic solitaire card games for free!
